name: I've Got A Bone To Pick With You
name_original: I've Got A Bone To Pick With You
description:
After you return from a work trip, you find your dog has destroyed your living room. He won't stop wailing, but it's up to you to figure out what's wrong!

Note: For the life of me, I cannot figure out why the game file name is "Sherlock", but I assure you it is the right game.

Artists

Kim Walters

ka-waltz.carrd.co

Narrative Designer/Programmer
